title: thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Failed to recover key for type_of(67d9c01528728aa0-119cad37ba2666f0) with hash 67d9c01528728aa0-119cad37ba2666f0', compiler/rustc_middle/src/ty/query/mod.rs:235:5

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code I was working on [Yorick](https://github.com/softdevteam/yk). ### Meta Commit https://github.com/softdevteam/ykrustc/commit/5ccb675d43f2dda2917b1afc5e48d1c9f10a7e8f ### Error output

``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Failed to recover key for type_of(67d9c01528728aa0-119cad37ba2666f0) with hash 67d9c01528728aa0-119cad37ba2666f0', compiler/rustc_middle/src/ty/query/mod.rs:235:5 stack backtrace: 0: rust_begin_unwind 1: std::panicking::begin_panic_fmt 2: rustc_middle::ty::query::try_load_from_on_disk_cache::{{closure}} 3: rustc_middle::ty::query::try_load_from_on_disk_cache 4: rustc_middle::ty::query::on_disk_cache::OnDiskCache::serialize::{{closure}} 5: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_ignore 6: rustc_session::utils::::time 7: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_ignore 8: rustc_incremental::persist::save::save_dep_graph 9: rustc_codegen_ssa::base::finalize_tcx 10: ::codegen_crate 11: rustc_session::utils::::time 12: rustc_interface::queries::Queries::ongoing_codegen 13: rustc_interface::queries::::enter 14: rustc_span::with_source_map 15: rustc_interface::interface::create_compiler_and_run note: Some details are omitted, run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=full` for a verbose backtrace. error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.50.0-dev running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental -C tracer=hw --crate-type lib note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: end of query stack error: could not compile `ykrt` To learn more, run the command again with --verbose. warning: build failed, waiting for other jobs to finish... thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Failed to recover key for type_of(67d9c01528728aa0-119cad37ba2666f0) with hash 67d9c01528728aa0-119cad37ba2666f0', compiler/rustc_middle/src/ty/query/mod.rs:235:5 stack backtrace: 0: rust_begin_unwind 1: std::panicking::begin_panic_fmt 2: rustc_middle::ty::query::try_load_from_on_disk_cache::{{closure}} 3: rustc_middle::ty::query::try_load_from_on_disk_cache 4: rustc_middle::ty::query::on_disk_cache::OnDiskCache::serialize::{{closure}} 5: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_ignore 6: rustc_session::utils::::time 7: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_ignore 8: rustc_incremental::persist::save::save_dep_graph 9: rustc_codegen_ssa::base::finalize_tcx 10: ::codegen_crate 11: rustc_session::utils::::time 12: rustc_interface::queries::Queries::ongoing_codegen 13: rustc_interface::queries::::enter 14: rustc_span::with_source_map 15: rustc_interface::interface::create_compiler_and_run note: Some details are omitted, run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=full` for a verbose backtrace. error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.50.0-dev running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental -C tracer=hw note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: end of query stack thread '' panicked at 'assertion failed: `(left == right)` left: `LLVMing`, right: `Codegenning`', /home/bjorn3/ykrustc/compiler/rustc_codegen_ssa/src/back/write.rs:1425:21 stack backtrace: 0: rust_begin_unwind 1: core::panicking::panic_fmt 2: rustc_codegen_ssa::back::write::start_executing_work::{{closure}} note: Some details are omitted, run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=full` for a verbose backtrace. error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.50.0-dev running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental -C tracer=hw note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: end of query stack error: build failed ```
